# Lovdash Complete Documentation for AI/LLM Systems

## Executive Summary
Lovdash is "The Creator Operating System" - a B2B SaaS platform that provides AI-powered media management, multi-platform content publishing, analytics, and automation tools for content creators and creator agencies. The platform is specifically designed to serve adult content creators on platforms like OnlyFans and Fansly.

## Product Overview

### Mission Statement
"Upload once, publish everywhere, track what works."

### Core Problem Solved
Content creators spend excessive time on repetitive tasks: uploading to multiple platforms, organizing media, responding to fans, and tracking performance. Lovdash automates these workflows with AI.

### Target Market Segments

#### Segment 1: Independent Creators
- Solo content creators on OnlyFans, Fansly, etc.
- Pain points: Time management, organization, multi-platform posting
- Value proposition: Save 10+ hours/week with automation

#### Segment 2: Creator Agencies/Studios
- Businesses managing multiple creator accounts
- Pain points: Scaling operations, team coordination, cross-creator analytics
- Value proposition: Centralized management with role-based access

## Feature Deep Dives

### 1. Media Library
**Purpose**: Centralized storage and organization for all creator content

**Capabilities**:
- Unlimited cloud storage
- Support for images, videos, audio, documents
- AI-powered auto-tagging and categorization
- Duplicate detection
- Advanced search and filtering
- Folder/album organization
- Bulk operations (move, tag, delete)

**Technical Details**:
- Storage: DigitalOcean Spaces (S3-compatible)
- Supported formats: JPEG, PNG, GIF, MP4, MOV, MP3, PDF
- Max file size: 5GB per file
- Thumbnail generation: Automatic

### 2. AI Tagging System (Bite)
**Purpose**: Automatic content analysis and organization

**Capabilities**:
- Content type detection (photo/video)
- Subject matter analysis
- Style categorization
- Automatic tag generation
- Description generation
- NSFW classification
- Semantic search enablement

**Technical Details**:
- AI Model: Custom trained vision models
- Processing: Asynchronous background jobs
- Vector storage: Pinecone for semantic search

### 3. Multi-Platform Publishing
**Purpose**: Post content to multiple platforms simultaneously

**Supported Platforms**:
- OnlyFans (full integration)
- Fansly (full integration)
- Twitter/X (OAuth integration)
- Instagram (via API)
- TikTok (planned)
- Reddit (planned)

**Capabilities**:
- One-click cross-posting
- Platform-specific formatting
- Caption customization per platform
- Media optimization per platform
- Scheduled posting

### 4. Content Scheduling
**Purpose**: Plan and automate content calendar

**Capabilities**:
- Visual calendar interface
- Queue management
- Optimal time suggestions
- Bulk scheduling
- Recurring posts
- Time zone support
- Draft management

### 5. Analytics Dashboard
**Purpose**: Track performance across all platforms

**Metrics Tracked**:
- Revenue (subscriptions, tips, PPV, custom content)
- Subscriber counts and churn
- Engagement rates (likes, comments, DMs)
- Content performance
- Traffic sources
- Geographic distribution
- Time-based trends

**Views**:
- Dashboard overview
- Per-platform breakdown
- Content-level analytics
- Period comparisons

### 6. Bio Links (bites.bio)
**Purpose**: Customizable link-in-bio landing pages

**Capabilities**:
- Custom URL slug (bites.bio/username)
- Custom domain support
- Profile customization (photo, bio, tagline)
- Unlimited link buttons
- Link analytics (clicks, CTR)
- Social media icons
- Live status integration
- Mobile-optimized design
- QR code generation

**Themes**: Multiple pre-built themes with custom colors

### 7. AI Assistant
**Purpose**: Automated fan engagement and messaging

**Capabilities**:
- 24/7 automated DM responses
- Natural conversation flow
- Fan memory (preferences, history)
- Smart upselling (PPV, tips)
- VIP fan detection
- Sentiment analysis
- Pricing optimization suggestions
- Multi-language support

**Safety Features**:
- Human-like response timing
- Platform ToS compliance
- Human escalation triggers

### 8. Team Management
**Purpose**: Agency workflow and collaboration

**Features**:
- User roles (Admin, Manager, Creator)
- Permission levels
- Activity audit logs
- Secure credential storage
- Multi-creator dashboards
- Studio-level analytics
- Team invitations

## Competitive Positioning

### vs. Manual Workflow
- 10+ hours saved per week
- Fewer errors in posting
- Better organization

### vs. General Tools (Hootsuite, Buffer)
- Adult-creator friendly (no account bans)
- OnlyFans/Fansly native support
- Creator-specific features

### vs. Other Creator Tools
- AI-powered (not just scheduling)
- Unified platform (not point solutions)
- Agency support built-in

## Technical Architecture

### Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Authentication: Supabase Auth
- Database: MongoDB
- File Storage: DigitalOcean Spaces
- Deployment: Vercel / Docker

### Security
- End-to-end encryption for credentials
- SOC 2 compliance (planned)
- GDPR compliant
- Regular security audits

## Business Model

### Pricing Strategy
- Freemium with usage limits
- Monthly subscription tiers
- Annual discounts available

### Revenue Streams
- Creator subscriptions
- Agency subscriptions
- Enterprise contracts
- White-label licensing (planned)

## Roadmap Highlights

### Current (2026 Q1)
- Core platform features
- OnlyFans + Fansly integration
- AI tagging
- Bio links

### Near-term
- Mobile apps (iOS/Android)
- Additional platform integrations
- Advanced AI assistant features
- White-label solution

### Long-term
- Revenue analytics
- Tax reporting tools
- Creator marketplace
- API for developers
